name: MSM Studio
description:
We deliver custom application software (mobile, web, desktop), eLearning content and software (HTML5), and animations (2D and 3D). In addition, we also develop in PHP. In mobile, we develop for Android and iOS, incl. iWatch, and we are a skillful user of Unity 3D. Our team of experienced programmers, creative artists and animators lets us create fantastic interactive software and content for multiple platforms.
The high quality of our services is widely recognized by our customers from Scandinavia, the UK, the USA, Ireland and Benelux.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Pomeranian Science and Technology Park , Aleja Zwyciestwa 96/98
